接口 ModelMethod

所有已知实现类:
Model
public interface ModelMethod
Interface defining the contract for model operations in the recipe management system. This interface provides method signatures for all business logic operations including user management, recipe operations, validation, and image handling.
从以下版本开始:
1.0

  • 方法详细资料

    • sign

      boolean sign(String name, String password)
      Registers a new user in the system.
      参数:
      name - the username for the new account
      password - the password for the new account
      返回:
      true if registration was successful, false otherwise

    • login

      boolean login(String name, String password)
      Authenticates a user login attempt.
      参数:
      name - the username to authenticate
      password - the password to verify
      返回:
      true if login was successful, false otherwise

    • updateImageNames

      List<String> updateImageNames(String recipeName)
      Updates and retrieves recipe names based on search criteria.
      参数:
      recipeName - the recipe name to search for
      返回:
      a list of matching recipe names

    • updateImageUrls

      HashMap<Integer,String> updateImageUrls(String recipeName)
      Updates and retrieves recipe image URLs based on search criteria.
      参数:
      recipeName - the recipe name to search for
      返回:
      a map of recipe IDs to their image URLs

    • getRecipeByID

      Recipe getRecipeByID(Integer id)
      Retrieves a recipe by its unique identifier.
      参数:
      id - the unique identifier of the recipe
      返回:
      the Recipe object if found, null otherwise

    • getRecipePreparationSteps

      List<PreparationStep> getRecipePreparationSteps(Integer id)
      Retrieves all preparation steps for a specific recipe.
      参数:
      id - the unique identifier of the recipe
      返回:
      a list of PreparationStep objects for the recipe

    • addRecipe

      Integer addRecipe(Recipe recipe)
      Adds a new recipe to the system.
      参数:
      recipe - the Recipe object to add
      返回:
      the ID of the newly created recipe

    • addRecipeIngredient

      void addRecipeIngredient(RecipeIngredient recipeIngredient)
      Adds a new ingredient to a recipe.
      参数:
      recipeIngredient - the RecipeIngredient object to add

    • updateRecipeIngredient

      void updateRecipeIngredient(Integer recipeID, List<RecipeIngredient> recipeIngredients)
      Updates all ingredients for a specific recipe.
      参数:
      recipeID - the ID of the recipe to update
      recipeIngredients - the list of updated ingredients

    • getAllRecipes

      List<Recipe> getAllRecipes()
      Retrieves all recipes in the system.
      返回:
      a list of all Recipe objects

    • duplicateImage

      Path duplicateImage(String imageURL)
      Duplicates an image file for recipe storage.
      参数:
      imageURL - the URL or path of the source image
      返回:
      the Path to the duplicated image file

    • serveNumberIsInteger

      boolean serveNumberIsInteger(String str)
      Validates if a string represents a valid integer for serving numbers.
      参数:
      str - the string to validate
      返回:
      true if the string is a valid integer, false otherwise

    • updateIngredientByServeNumber

      List<RecipeIngredient> updateIngredientByServeNumber(Integer id, String serveNumber)
      Updates ingredient quantities based on serving number changes.
      参数:
      id - the recipe ID
      serveNumber - the new serving number
      返回:
      a list of updated RecipeIngredient objects

    • getIngredientByID

      List<RecipeIngredient> getIngredientByID(Integer id)
      Retrieves all ingredients for a specific recipe.
      参数:
      id - the unique identifier of the recipe
      返回:
      a list of RecipeIngredient objects for the recipe

    • updateRecipe

      void updateRecipe(Recipe recipe)
      Updates an existing recipe in the system.
      参数:
      recipe - the Recipe object with updated information

    • addRecipePreparationStep

      void addRecipePreparationStep(PreparationStep preparationStep)
      Adds a new preparation step to a recipe.
      参数:
      preparationStep - the PreparationStep object to add

    • updateRecipePreparationStep

      void updateRecipePreparationStep(Integer recipeID, List<PreparationStep> preparationSteps)
      Updates all preparation steps for a specific recipe.
      参数:
      recipeID - the ID of the recipe to update
      preparationSteps - the list of updated preparation steps

    • deleteRecipe

      void deleteRecipe(Integer recipeID)
      Deletes a recipe and all its associated data.
      参数:
      recipeID - the ID of the recipe to delete

    • validateRecipe

      boolean validateRecipe(String recipeName, String cookingTime, String preparationTime, String recipeImage)
      Validates recipe basic information.
      参数:
      recipeName - the name of the recipe
      cookingTime - the cooking time
      preparationTime - the preparation time
      recipeImage - the recipe image URL
      返回:
      true if validation passes, false otherwise

    • validateRecipeIngredient

      boolean validateRecipeIngredient(String recipeName, Float quantity, String unit)
      Validates recipe ingredient information.
      参数:
      recipeName - the name of the ingredient
      quantity - the quantity of the ingredient
      unit - the unit of measurement
      返回:
      true if validation passes, false otherwise
